sentences.sContent: Beethoven was extremely influential as among the first composers to work freelance rather than being employed full-time by a royal or ecclesiastic patron.
sentences.sContent_eng: Beethoven was extremely influential as among the first composers to work freelance rather than being employed full-time by a royal or ecclesiastic patron.
sentences.sCn: 贝多芬作为并非全职供职于皇家和教会赞助人，而作为自由职业者的首位作曲家而极具影响力。

sentences.sContent: For example, the appearance of freelance shows that work with fixed working hours-9 to 5-can be changed?
sentences.sContent_eng: For example, the appearance of freelance shows that work with fixed working hours-9 to 5-can be changed?
sentences.sCn: 比如说，自由职业者的出现证明固定的工作时间——9点到5点——可以改变。

remMethod.val: free(自由) + lance(看作lines， 几行字) → 自由地写东西做事 → 当自由职业者

words.tran: 自由地；免费地；大量地；慷慨地；直率地
自由保有；[会计] 不动产所有权
自由民；享有市民权的人；荣誉市民
使自由；解放（free的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: working independently for different companies rather than being employed by one particular company
